title: New year's card: circular 2
content:
Hi! I’m trying to make a new year’s card using the olympic rings to spell 2008.

I’m looking for a font where the number 2 makes the first (blue) circle and the 2 last rings (red-green) make up the 8.

It should look a bit like this

[http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8121/2008pi4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511151704/http:/img90.imageshack.us/img90/8121/2008pi4.png)

Does anybody know about a font with a ’2’ like that?

If there are any ideas out there on how to connect the red and green rings to make the 8 mor obvious, those are welcome too!

TIA

Peter

 [‹ Er...what is a font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511151704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14701 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font for headline ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511151704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40114 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Milachka
